name: Ranko Milic
goal:
The Association was founded with the purpose of promotion and development of eco-social economy and social entrepreneurship, or in other words for the purpose of comprehensive and sustainable human development, development of organizations and communities.
Eco-social economy and social entrepreneurship is defined as any commercial or entrepreneurial activity that combines social, economic and environmental objectives, and integrates prosperity / profits with concern for people and the environment (3P = people, planet, profit / prosperity – triple bottom line model).
The Association will encourage and assist the development of eco-social economy and social entrepreneurship in all forms and sectors. The purpose is to increase the efficiency, competitiveness, visibility and influence of eco-social development at the local, national and global level.
Association networks civil, private and public economic, research and development and scientific subjects in the field of eco-social development, and creates a framework for lasting, stimulating and economic co-operation and exchange, encourages joint actions at local, national and global markets of products and services of the eco-social economy. The Association creates and connects the supporting systems for eco-social development and supports the efforts for the capacity building for eco-social development.
In its work, the Association shall adhere to the basic human, social and democratic values, social and environmental responsibility, solidarity, subsidiarity, sustainability, mutual trust based on the credibility and consistency, and the constant effort of improving the quality of its work and action, honest and proactive mutual support based on the awareness of the interdependence of individuals, organizations, institutions and communities, creativity and wise and effective leadership based on personal integrity of character and competence.
